reviewText: A wonderful collection and recipes. I hope there will be some new episodes released on DVD soon. We truly enjoy the Christmas specials.
Amazing collection.  Just wished it included "Jamie's Cracking Christmas".  Highly recommended.

I love British cooking shows, especially ones centered on "The Holidays".  Lots of good advice and the shows put you in the holiday spirit.  I keep it on in the background while up getting things ready for friends and family to come over.  Jamie's delivery is a hoot...and he seems like such a nice guy.
